title: Coffee App
description: Developed an iOS coffee app in Swift by implementing Yelp API to retrieve nearby coffee places by integrating MapKit and Firebase.

title: Ecommerce website
description: Developed a feature-rich e-commerce platform for jewelry, focused on providing a seamless shopping experience.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Developed a responsive and interactive personal portfolio website using React to showcase projects, skills and experience

title: Travel App
description: Developed an iOS App that provides user an option to find nearby places in the city user is travelling to using API and MapKit.

title: Stock Market Dashboard
description: Developed a stock market dashboard application that visualizes stock performance using interactive charts and real-time data.
